resources.string: If you set trail enabled, you must set a value to button_trail_drawable.
Allows Flow Launcher to perform button press actions

Flow Launcher needs to be activated as an accessibility service in order to perform button press actions such as back, home, recents, and power, as well as displaying the notification tray.\n\nThis permission is used only to perform button press actions, and for no other purpose.
%s requires permission to draw over other apps before it can start.\n\n
Please press \"Grant Permission\" and ensure that \"Permit drawing over other apps\" is enabled.
Please press \"Open Settings\" to open the Android TV app settings menu. Select \"Special app access\", then select \"Display over other apps\" and ensure that Flow Launcher is enabled.

Unfortunately, due to OEM restrictions, this feature can't be enabled on your device.

You may still be able to enable it by using this adb shell command:

appops set %1$s %2$s allow
Something is wrong! Please try again.
